channel.title: projects on exploiting croissants
channel.description: Recent content in projects on exploiting croissants

item.title: Projects
item.description: exploiting-croissants releases # Here’s the list of my currently available projects that I have done so far (all of them being available via my github repo): Kipferl-OS/Privacy-oriented-Personal-Device-Experience-Project-PPDEP Learn how and why today’s consumer smartphones do not prove to offer or guarantee a private environment regarding personal data processing that is happening on that particular smartphone device. null 0 0 Kipferl-OS/Pi-Hole-on-Android-through-linux-image-server There’s no OS involved really, I just like succumbing myself in whatever distribution comes handy, I may even develop an obsession for it.
